summary: Adds light and heavy armour variants based on the craftable metal armours already available in vanilla Skyrim. All armours contain custom crafting recipes, custom stats (appropriate to changes made), and custom meshes.
descriptionHtml:
[center][size=5][b][u]Full Metal Armory[/u][/b][/size][/center]

[b][u]Description[/u][/b]
Full Metal Armory aims to further immersion in Skyrim by allowing the player to craft similarly styled armours based on those already present in the game. All armours are made to have different crafting recipes, different stats (Appropriate to the changes made), and new meshes. Every metal armour that the player can craft normally is now available with a new light or heavy version (depending on existing armour).

[b][u]To-Do[/u][/b]
[list][*]Create Meshes
[*]Create Ground Models
[*]Add to Stores
[*]Add to Leveled Lists
[*]Allow Enemies to Wear Variants
[/list]
[color=red]THIS MOD IS INCOMPLETE!!! IT IS PLAYABLE BUT DOES NOT YET HAVE MUCH OF THE DESIRED CONTENT![/color]
author: Burgandy
